thread.title: New Kendrick Lamar album IV: K-Dot confirms next release with sole Instagram post
thread.title_full: New Kendrick Lamar album IV: K-Dot confirms next release with sole Instagram post

author: Christopher Hooton
title: New Kendrick Lamar album IV: K-Dot confirms next release with sole Instagram post
text:
Thursday 23 March 2017 09:31 GMT Click to followThe Independent Culture Kendrick Lamar 
Kendrick Lamar has all but confirmed the follow-up to To Pimp a Butterfly is on the way. 
His Instagram account this morning contains just one post, a marbled black square bearing the numerals ‘IV’. 
This would seem to reference the albums that came before it: Section.80 (I), Good Kid mAAd City (II) and To Pimp a Butterfly (III). Mar 23, 2017 at 1:55am PDT 
More to follow…
